name: Clank
description: Sentient constructs forged from metal, wood, or stone, often self‑modified for style or function.

features.name: Purposeful Design
features.description: At character creation, choose an Experience aligned with your built purpose and gain +1 to it.

features.name: Efficient
features.description: During a short rest you may instead take a long‑rest move.

name: Drakona
description: Wingless dragon‑folk with armored scales and elemental breath.

features.name: Scales
features.description: When you would take Severe damage, mark 1 fewer Hit Point by marking a Stress instead.

features.name: Elemental Breath
features.description: Choose an element; treat as d8 Instinct magic attack within Very Close range.

name: Dwarf
description: Stout stone‑blooded artisans famed for resilience and gemstone‑studded skin.

features.name: Thick Skin
features.description: You may mark 2 Stress instead of a Hit Point when you take Minor damage.

features.name: Increased Fortitude
features.description: Spend 3 Hope to halve incoming physical damage.

name: Elf
description: Tall, keen‑eared folk who enter celestial trances instead of sleep.

name: Firbolg
description: Fur‑covered horned giants whose power is tempered by patience.

features.name: Charge
features.description: On Agility success moving from Far to Melee, mark Stress to deal 1d12 damage to all in Melee.

features.name: Unshakable
features.description: When you would mark Stress, roll d6; on 6 do not mark it.

name: Fungril
description: Mushroom‑folk linked by vast mycelial networks and memory of death.

features.name: Fungril Network
features.description: Instinct Roll (12) to telepathically converse with Fungril anywhere.

features.name: Death Connection
features.description: While touching a fresh corpse, mark Stress to glean one evocative memory.

name: Galapa
description: Turtle‑folk whose massive shells serve as natural fortresses.

features.name: Shell
features.description: Add Proficiency to both damage thresholds.

features.name: Retract
features.description: Mark Stress to retreat into shell, gaining resistance to physical damage but limiting actions.

name: Giant
description: Towering one‑ to three‑eyed people gifted with reach and endurance.

features.name: Endurance
features.description: Gain an additional Hit Point slot.

features.name: Reach
features.description: Treat Melee ranges you wield as Very Close.

name: Goblin
description: Quick‑footed smallfolk with vast ears and sharper instincts.

features.name: Surefooted
features.description: Ignore disadvantage on Agility rolls.

features.name: Danger Sense
features.description: Once per rest, mark Stress to force an adversary to reroll an attack against you or a Very Close ally.

name: Halfling
description: Good‑natured hairy‑footed wanderers blessed by fortune and uncanny bearings.

features.name: Luckbringer
features.description: At session start, each party member gains a Hope.

features.name: Internal Compass
features.description: When you roll a 1 on your Hope Die, you may reroll it.

name: Human
description: Versatile, enduring people of boundless potential.

features.name: High Stamina
features.description: Gain an extra Stress slot at character creation.

features.name: Adaptability
features.description: When a roll using an Experience fails, you may mark Stress to reroll.

name: Ribbet
description: Amphibious folk who hatch as tadpoles and bound across land with powerful legs.

features.name: Amphibious
features.description: You can breathe and move naturally underwater.

features.name: Long Tongue
features.description: As a Close Finesse weapon (d12 damage) by marking Stress.

name: Simiah
description: Dexterous ape‑folk who climb and grasp with hands, feet, and sometimes tails.

features.name: Natural Climber
features.description: Advantage on Agility rolls for balancing and climbing.

features.name: Nimble
features.description: Gain +1 permanent Evasion at character creation.
